question: What is the theme of 2017 World Tourism Day (WTD)?
option1: Tourism: Responding to the Challenge of Climate Change
option2: Sustainable tourism - a tool for development
option3: Tourism for all – promoting universal accessibility
answer: Sustainable tourism - a tool for development
explanation: The World Tourism Day (WTD) is observed every year on September 27 to raise awareness among the international community of the importance of tourism and its social, cultural, political and economic value. The 2017 theme “Sustainable tourism - a tool for development” is dedicated to explore the contribution of tourism to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG). On the occasion of World Tourism Day, President Ram Nath Kovind will give away the National Tourism Awards and will Launch Incredible India 2.0 Campaign in New Delhi.
